category_descriptions.Bulk Commodity Green Coffee: Raw, unroasted coffee beans traded in large quantities, typically used as raw materials for major coffee brands and manufacturers (default even if you know this is a coffee related product and not into the other categories)
category_descriptions.Specialty Green Coffee: Unroasted beans from specific farms, producers, or unique lots, often with special processing methods (like anaerobic fermentation). Sold in smaller quantities at a premium to specialty roasters
category_descriptions.Finished Coffee Products: Processed and packaged items for direct sale to consumers like roasted coffee, instant coffee, etc

_comment: This is an example products definition file. Customize for your product domain.

_instructions.hs_code: The HS code for this product category (4-digit string)
_instructions.product_categories: List of product category names that goods can be classified into
_instructions.category_descriptions: Optional descriptions for each category to guide LLM classification
